result.title: Осенние учебно-тренировочные сборы по спортивному программированию 2014
result.content:
The Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (state university) in collaboration with the Lomonosov Moscow State University organizes the Moscow Open Fall Programming Training for students.

Training dates: November 12-22. Training location: MIPT (Dolgoprudny, Moscow Region).

The Training will be based on MIPT during the period between the Sub-Regional and Regional contests of the ACM ICPC Championship and are aimed at preparation to the Regional contest of ACM ICPC. The training schedule is planned to have 9 working days with everyday studying contests, tests, practice and lectures included.

The participation fee is:

  • for students NOT from Russia and ex-USSR states is 350$ per participant
  • for others 19 000 rubles

The cost of the fee includes:

  • participation in educational activities
  • three meals a day
  • accommodation in a comfortable campus

The official language of the training is English.

Participants and teams who want to take part in the Training need to pass a preliminary registration until 5th of November, 2014. We expect your propositions about which topics you would like to hear in the Training (topics can be specified in the registration blank).

Please note that you will possibly need a visa to enter Russia. Preparing an official Visa invitation will take some time so please, register as soon as possible. Then we will contact you to obtain necessary information.

For any questions: acm@phystech.edu

Official site: http://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/fall_training_2014
